official-title.#text: To authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2015 for intelligence and intelligence-related activities of the United States Government, the Community Management Account, and the Central Intelligence Agency Retirement and Disability System, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

text.#text: Funds are hereby authorized to be appropriated for fiscal year 2015 for the conduct of the intelligence and intelligence-related activities of the following elements of the United States Government:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}prop.#text: for the Central Intelligence Agency Retirement and Disability Fund

header.#text: Central Intelligence Agency Retirement and Disability System

text.#text: Appropriations authorized by this Act for salary, pay, retirement, and other benefits for Federal employees may be increased by such additional or supplemental amounts as may be necessary for increases in such compensation or benefits authorized by law.

header.#text: Increase in employee compensation and benefits authorized by law

text.#text: The authorization of appropriations by this Act shall not be deemed to constitute authority for the conduct of any intelligence activity which is not otherwise authorized by the Constitution or the laws of the United States.

header.#text: Restriction on conduct of intelligence activities

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2015
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2015
